titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Supreme Government that the Acting Resident has been moved into temporary accommodation, while repairs are made to the factory at Bushire by Mahomed Jaffer Khan [Muḥammad Ja‘afar Khān], Governor of Bushire. The repairs are expected the take between twenty days and one month; they have been prompted by a firmaun [Firman] from Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, the Prince at Shiraz, who ordered that it should be either repaired or torn down.
